Text:
Hei, Klarer noen å få tak i Söderbergs "The voice"? Jeg har leita etter den i lang tid nå.. 
Does anyone have the Söderberg art movie / ducumentary "The voice"? i have been looking for it for a long time.

I will buy it when it gets possible, but until then, please uppload it if you have it.

http://soderberg.tv/
err.. i added a link to the artists homepage, go to "films" then click nr4 and then play :) This docu is insane
Can also be downloaded from http://www.theyliewedie.org/ressources/videos/videos-en.php along with other good social videos
